ParallelChunk.en: Corrections to votes and voting intentions: see Minutes
ParallelChunk.fr: Corrections et intentions de vote: cf. procès-verbal

ParallelChunk.en: (The sitting was suspended at 12.50 p.m. and resumed at 3 p.m.)
ParallelChunk.fr: (La séance, suspendue à 12 h 50, est reprise à 15 heures)
